title: BCI’s $182 Billion Pension Fund Names Jon Salon Head of Private Equity Unit
description: British Columbia Investment Management Corp. named Jon Salon as the new global head of private equity, succeeding industry veteran Jim Pittman, who is leaving the pension plan at the end of the month.
